name: IRiSS 2013 Workshop: Shell, Text1, and Text2
tagline: Materials for the Text units 1 and 2 for the IRiSS CSS workshop 2013
body:
### IRiSS CSS Workshop:
## Shell, Text 1, Text 2

You can either check out the content from shell with `git` installed or with the GitHub client.  Here are some instructions.

You can also download the .zip or .tar.gz.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
